firstNightReminder: Point to all players marked as *CONNECTED*
name: P.I.♡
ability: You start knowing players with a unique connection. each day, privately guess what this connection is and learn how accurate you are

name: Socialite♡
ability: Once per game, visit the Storyteller with other players: if all are townsfolk, all learn this [+0 to +1 outsiders]

name: Swing Voter»
ability: You must vote the opposite of how you voted last nomination.
flavor: Who did I vote for? Well it wasn't the Royalists that's for sure!
Did you hear about Maria? I heard she’s hiding in the inn. Yeah, we can’t let anyone know.
name: Blabbermouth
ability: You know a phrase. Each dusk, if publicly, no other alive good player said it or a Minion guessed it (even if dead), your team loses.

jinxes.reason: If the good Blabbermouth's phrase is guessed and the Matsuraid is in play, good only wins if a Minion or Demon is executed.
